12 𒌚𒊺𒆥𒋻 ŠE.KIN.KU5 cutting of corn Addaru / Adār 𒌚𒊺 harvest month √sec Adar אֲדָר (אֲדָר א׳/אֲדָר רִאשׁון if there is an intercalary month that year) Adar ࡀࡃࡀࡓ Ādhār آذَار Feb/Mar
